cause.description:
Provide community-level development programs, and humanitarian and medical aid programs, designed to offer hope to the youngest and most vulnerable victims of the Chernobyl disaster – the children. We serve children without respect to race, religion, or sex.
1. Save lives
2. Impove living condtions
3. Work with the people of Belarus to end poverty
